focusingrange: 0.4 in. (1cm) - infinity (W), 4.3 ft. (1.3m) - infinity (T) Macro: 1 - 50cm (0.4 in. - 1.6 ft.) (W) Macro:  1.2 in. - 2.0 ft. (3-60cm) (W)
erasemodes: Single  Image*, Erase All The image data in the memory card stored with the design rule for   camera file  systems format can be erased (however, protected images   cannot be erased). * Movies can be erased individually.
exposurecompensation: +/-2 stops in 1/3 stop increments (Not available when shooting movies)
shootingcapacity: Normal: Approx. 200 shots ECO Mode: Approx. 275 shots
continuousshooting: Approx: 0.8 shots/sec. (In P Mode) Approx. 2.9 shots/sec. (In Low Light Mode)
numberofrecordingpixels: Still Images: 1) 16:9 - Large: 4608 x 2592; Medium 1: 3264 x 1832; Medium 2: 1920 x 1080; Small: 640 x 360 2) 3:2 - Large: 4608 x 3072; Medium 1: 3264 x 2176; Medium 2: 1600 x 1064; Small: 640 x 424 3) 4:3 - Large: 4608 x 3456; Medium 1: 3264 x 2448; Medium 2: 1600 x 1200; Small: 640 x 480 4) 1:1 - Large: 3456 x 3456; Medium 1: 2448 x 2448; Medium 2: 1200 x 1200; Small: 480 x 480 - 2304 x 1728 when in Low Light Videos: HD 1280 x 720: 25 fps 640 x 480: 30 fps (29.97) Miniature Effect HD 1280 x 720: 5 fps*1 / 2.5 fps*1 / 1.25 fps*1 Miniature Effect 640 x 480: 6 fps*2 / 3 fps*2 / 1.5 fps*2 *1 Playback frame rate is 25 fps *2 Playback frame rate is 30 fps (29.97)
selftimer: Off / 2 sec. / 10 sec. / Custom Timer* * Delay time (0 - 15 sec. (in one-second increments), 20/25/30 sec.) and   number of shots (1 - 10 shots (in one-shot increments)) can be   specified.
